summary: This is an email chain from June 11, 2008, scheduling a telephone call for Friday, June 13, 2008, at 10:00 AM to discuss a matter related to 'Epstein'. The participants are coordinating their availability for the call.

events.title: Scheduled Epstein Discussion Call
events.description: A telephone call is scheduled for 10:00 AM to discuss a matter related to Epstein.

keyFacts: An email chain dated June 11, 2008, coordinates a call about Epstein scheduled for June 13, 2008.
The subject of the correspondence is 'Epstein/call in fron' and 'Epstein', indicating the call's purpose.
The call was scheduled for 10:00 AM Eastern Time and participants were to join by phone.
